title: Poster, 1964–65
inscribed: Lower right along edge in small black letters: Entwuft: A. Hofmann    Photo: Max Mathys    Druck: Wassenmann AG
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: With black text at top and along left side, the predominate image is a pale gray photograph of a woman looking at herself in a corner of a mirror.  The image is closely cropped so the face fills the majority of the sheet.  The light gray image on white background is counterbalanced by the large black text at left which reads:  Stadt / Theater / Basel / Saison 1964/65 / Theater als Zeispiegel.  Integral to the design is a second block of text at left which reads: Während der / Saison 1964/65 / finden Sie / an dieser Stelle / den Spielplan. / Der / Saisonprospekt / ist erschienen; / er orientiert Sie / über den Spielplan, das / Ensemble und die / günstigen / Abonnements.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1964–65.
1964–65. Offset lithograph on white wove. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-146.
